Cardboard Box Storage Bins: Cut and shape cardboard boxes into storage bins for toys, books, or other items. Customize with colors and decorations.

DIY Cardboard Box Planters: Make planters for flowers or herbs using cardboard boxes. Cut out windows and add decorations to create a whimsical garden.
Cardboard Box Playground: Design a playground using cardboard boxes, including a slide, swing set, and other obstacle courses. This is a great way to encourage physical activity and creativity.
